casename: Low Hua Kin v Kumagai-Zenecon Construction Pte Ltd (in liquidation) and Another
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Alvin Yeo SC and Nandakumar Ponniya (Wong Partnership) for the appellant; Anthony Lee and Rodney Keong (Bih Li & Lee) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Companies/Directors/Duties/Breach of fiduciary duty/Whether loss suffered by company's loss caused by director's breach of duty
